text: The Province of Lower Canada was a British colony in Canada. It included Labrador and the southern part of Quebec. It was created in 1791 when Britain split Quebec into two provinces. It was merged in 1841 with the rest of Quebec to form the Province of Canada. == References == Category:Historical territories of Canada Category:British North America Category:1791 establishments in Canada Category:19th-century disestablishments in North America Category:1841 disestablishments
title: Lower Canada
